title: Mott The Hoople: Live (1974) Deluxe 2-CD Set (2004)
description:
Mott The Hoople

30th Anniversary Edition 2004

Expanded 2-CD Set

21 Tracks (13 previously unreleased)



  2CDs / 2004 / Remastered / 320Kbps



CD 1 / Broadway:
